H0.text: What is the name of the fuel depot near Hemel Hempstead that caught fire in December 2005. Buncefield Oil Depot

H1.text: What is the name of the fuel depot near Hemel Hempstead that caught fire in December 2005. Hemel Hempstead Fuel Storage

H2.text: What is the name of the fuel depot near Hemel Hempstead that caught fire in December 2005. Hertfordshire Oil Terminal

H3.text: What is the name of the fuel depot near Hemel Hempstead that caught fire in December 2005. HOSL

A4.text: Buncefield oil depot is operated by Hertfordshire Oil Storage Ltd (HOSL) and officially known as the Hertfordshire Oil Storage Terminal.

A5.text: officially known as the Hertfordshire Oil Storage Terminal
